mapper.insert: INSERT /* paltoncommon.xml : paltoncommon.insertDisInfoList by PaLtonCommonController-goodsKinds-std-list */ INTO TPALTONSTANDARDDISPLIST ( STD_CAT_ID , MALL_DVS_CD , DISP_CAT_ID , INSERT_ID , INSERT_DATE , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( #{stdCatId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{mallDvsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{dispCatId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE )

INSERT /* paltoncommon.xml : paltoncommon.insertAttrInfoList by PaLtonCommonController-goodsKinds-std-list */ INTO TPALTONSTANDARDATTRLIST ( STD_CAT_ID , ATTR_PI_TYPE , ATTR_ID , PRIO_RNK , INSERT_ID , INSERT_DATE , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( #{stdCatId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{attrPiType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{attrId, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , #{prioRnk, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE )

INSERT /* paltoncommon.xml : paltoncommon.insertPdItmsInfoList by PaLtonCommonController-goodsKinds-std-list */ INTO TPALTONSTANDARDPDITEMSLIST ( STD_CAT_ID , PD_ITMS_CD , INSERT_ID , INSERT_DATE , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( #{stdCatId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{pdItmsCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE )

INSERT /* paltoncommon.xml : paltoncommon.insertPaLtonBrand by PaLtonCommonController-brand-List */ INTO TPABRAND ( PA_GROUP_CODE , PA_BRAND_NO , PA_BRAND_NAME , USE_YN , INSERT_ID , INSERT_DATE , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( #{paGroupCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paBrandNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paBrandName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE )
mapper.select:
SELECT /* paltoncommon.xml : palton.paltoncommon.selectSlipInsertList by PaLtonCommonController-returnSlipInsert */ NVL(EU.POST_NO,'99999') AS POST_NO , NVL(EU.POST_ADDR,'없음') AS POST_ADDR , NVL(EU.ADDR,'-') as ADDR , NVL(EU.STD_ROAD_POST,'999999') AS STD_ROAD_POST , NVL(EU.STD_POST_ADDR1,'없음') AS STD_POST_ADDR1 , NVL(EU.STD_POST_ADDR2,'-') AS STD_POST_ADDR2 , EU.ENTP_CODE , EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ , EU.ENTP_MAN_GB , EU.ENTP_MAN_NAME , EU.ENTP_MAN_DDD || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL2 AS ENTP_MAN_TEL , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1 || DECODE(EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1, NULL, '', '-') || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2 || DECODE(EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2, NULL, '', '-') || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP3 AS ENTP_MAN_HP FROM TENTPUSER EU , TENTERPRISE EP WHERE EU.ENTP_CODE = EP.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_CODE = #{entpCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = #{entpManSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM TPAENTPSLIP PL WHERE EU.ENTP_CODE = PL.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = PL.ENTP_MAN_SEQ AND PL.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT /* paltoncommon.xml : palton.paltoncommon.selectEntpSlipUpdateList by PaLtonCommonController-entpShipUpdate */ NVL(EU.POST_NO,'99999') AS POST_NO , NVL(EU.POST_ADDR,'없음') AS POST_ADDR , NVL(EU.ADDR,'-') as ADDR , NVL(EU.STD_ROAD_POST,'999999') AS STD_ROAD_POST , NVL(EU.STD_POST_ADDR1,'없음') AS STD_POST_ADDR1 , NVL(EU.STD_POST_ADDR2,'-') AS STD_POST_ADDR2 , EU.ENTP_CODE , EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ , EU.ENTP_MAN_GB , EU.ENTP_MAN_NAME , EU.ENTP_MAN_DDD || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL2 AS ENTP_MAN_TEL , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1 || DECODE(EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1, NULL, '', '-') || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2 || DECODE(EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2, NULL, '', '-') || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP3 AS ENTP_MAN_HP , PL.PA_CODE , PL.PA_ADDR_SEQ FROM TENTPUSER EU , TENTERPRISE EP , TPAENTPSLIP PL WHERE EU.ENTP_CODE = EP.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_CODE = PL.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = PL.ENTP_MAN_SEQ AND PL.PA_CODE IN ('81','82') AND PL.PA_ADDR_GB IN ('20','30') AND PL.TRANS_TARGET_YN = '1' AND PL.PA_ADDR_SEQ IS NOT NULL

SELECT /* paltoncommon.xml : palton.paltoncommon.selectEntpSlipUpdate by PaLtonSellerService */ NVL(EU.POST_NO,'99999') AS POST_NO , NVL(EU.POST_ADDR,'없음') AS POST_ADDR , NVL(EU.ADDR,'-') as ADDR , NVL(EU.STD_ROAD_POST,'999999') AS STD_ROAD_POST , NVL(EU.STD_POST_ADDR1,'없음') AS STD_POST_ADDR1 , NVL(EU.STD_POST_ADDR2,'-') AS STD_POST_ADDR2 , EU.ENTP_CODE , EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ , EU.ENTP_MAN_GB , EU.ENTP_MAN_NAME , EU.ENTP_MAN_DDD || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 || '-' || EU.ENTP_MAN_TEL2 AS ENTP_MAN_TEL , EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1 || DECODE(EU.ENTP_MAN_HP1, NULL, '', '-') || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2 || DECODE(EU.ENTP_MAN_HP2, NULL, '', '-') || EU.ENTP_MAN_HP3 AS ENTP_MAN_HP , PL.PA_CODE , PL.PA_ADDR_SEQ FROM TENTPUSER EU , TENTERPRISE EP , TPAENTPSLIP PL WHERE EU.ENTP_CODE = EP.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_CODE = PL.ENTP_CODE AND EU.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = PL.ENTP_MAN_SEQ AND PL.PA_CODE = #{paCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PL.TRANS_TARGET_YN = '1' AND PL.PA_ADDR_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND PL.ENTP_CODE = #{entpCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PL.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = #{entpManSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT /* paltoncommon.xml : palton.paltoncommon.selectEntpSlipCost */ CSC.PA_CODE , CSC.GROUP_CODE , CSC.ORD_COST , CSC.RETURN_COST , CSC.ISLAND_COST , CSC.JEJU_COST , CSC.SHIP_COST_BASE_AMT , CSC.ENTP_CODE , CSC.SHIP_COST_CODE FROM TPACUSTSHIPCOST CSC WHERE CSC.TRANS_TARGET_YN = '1'
AND CSC.GROUP_CODE IS NOT NULL
AND CSC.GROUP_CODE IS NULL
AND CSC.PA_CODE IN ('81','82') ORDER BY CSC.ENTP_CODE, CSC.ORD_COST, CSC.SHIP_COST_BASE_AMT
SELECT /* paltoncommon.xml : palton.paltoncommon.selectAddShipCost*/ AC.PA_CODE , AC.ISLAND_COST , AC.JEJU_COST FROM TPALTONADDSHIPCOST AC WHERE AC.DV_CST_POL_NO IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT /* paltoncommon.xml : paltoncommon.insertPaLtonOrigin by PaLtonCommonController-retrieve-common-code */ INTO TPAORIGIN ( PA_GROUP_CODE , PA_ORIGIN_CODE , PA_ORIGIN_NAME , REMARK1 , REMARK2 , REMARK3 , REMARK4 , INSERT_ID , INSERT_DATE , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( '08' , #{cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{cdNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{refcChrValEpn1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{refcChrValEpn2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{refcChrValEpn3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{refcChrValEpn4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE , 'PALTON' , SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: DELETE /* paltoncommon.xml : palton.paltoncommon.deletePaLtonSettlement */ FROM TPALTONSETTLEMENT WHERE FLAG = #{flag, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TO_DATE(SE_STD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
